Hi,

Thanks for the reply. I have tried with
WebClient.setRedirectEnabled() but I am still getting
the same error.

Thanks and Regards,
Saldin

--- "J. B. Rainsberger" <jbrains@...> wrote:

> saldin samuel wrote:
> 
> > I am getting the following error on using
> HtmlUnit. I
> > tried searching for a solution but I couldnt. It
> would
> > be great if you could provide me an "how-to" to
> solve
> > this issue.
> 
> I'm shocked that you couldn't find an answer on the
> web.
> 
> WebClient.setRedirectEnabled() is the method you
> want--or at least it's 
> very close to the method you want.
> 
> Good luck.
